name: Grand Theft Auto
description: Drive dozens of varied vehicles around three of America's toughest cities. Only the best will be able to tame the fastest cars. Only the smartest will know all the short-cuts and the whereabouts of the hottest wheels. Only the toughest will be able to take on the world and finish the job like a professional...
minimum_requirements: OS: DOS 6.0, Windows 95, Windows 98 Processor: 75 MHz Pentium or equivalent Memory: 16 Mb of RAM Hard Disk Space: 80 MB of Hard Disk Space Video Card: 1MB VESA compatible SVGA graphics card Sound: Sound Card

reviews.review_text: Fast action, dark humor, and machineguns... What else do you need to have a fun game?
14 years after its initial release, still ALLOT of fun. Not many games have achieved that.
first time i played this the only thing a could was mayhem. damn miss those days
Cant go wrong with the game that started it all
[?/10] (all you need to know is GTA series always better than any other games)   Grand Theft Auto, best game Series in human history. Thank you, Rockstar Games.
BUSTEEEED.  SHOTGUUUUN.  The sounds in game should be modded over to gta v.
DO NOT PLAY. YOU WILL HATE IT. TOTAL BORE, TOP DOWN VIEW.

The classic, the one, the only, GTA. This is free to play off the Rockstar Classics site - so no doubt get it for free if possible, but this really started open world gaming. You need a set million X points to progress - get it with missions (easiest way) or by doing whatever you want - police are agressive, top down view is fast and frentic, and it is damn hard in later levels! Wonderful stuff, then and mostly now.
